name: Shooting Boy Supremacy
description:
Hello, Friend just downloads Shooting Boy Supremacy is a mobile action game that puts your shooting enemies. 

As the protagonist, you play as a skilled marksman tasked with taking down waves of enemies, each one more challenging than the last.

 Collect the coins and points, challenge yourself, and avoid the obstacle. Just click the Download button, and install it on your Device. Enjoy It!

  • Collect the Coins
  • Kill as many enemies as you can
  • Shoot The enemies with your Fire weapon
  • Challenge yourself or with your friend
  • Drive a car
  • Take a Plane
  • Avoid Obstacle
  • Reach HighScore
